description: A set of questions to test the software with
name: Test MQF

questions.question: AD1. To determine an individual aircraft’s maximum payload weight:
responses: Add Operating Weight to Maximum Ramp Weight
Add Operating Weight to Maximum Zero Fuel Weight
Subtract Operating Weight from Maximum Zero Fuel Weight
Subtract Operating Weight from Maximum Ramp Weight

questions.question: AD2. Low EGT margin engines are more susceptible to ENG EGT X alerts on the WAP when OAT is at or above and thrust is at or near maximum thrust?
AD3. The AP has two modes of operation; _____, and _____.
AD4. AP DEGRADED mode will not engage below Vmma with invalid aircraft weights (both MC’s inop, etc).
AD5. THRUST LOSS annunciator lights (amber) will illuminate in flight when thrust of a single engine is ______ less than the average EPR of the remaining engines.

AD6. In the event of boost pump failure, fuel can be suction fed by the engine driven fuel pump at _____ thrust rating up to an altitude of _____ feet and at a pitch angle no greater than 21.5 degrees.
